abstract: Trustees of financially troubled South Carolina State University unanimously vote to place president Thomas Elzey on administrative leave.
lead_paragraph: Trustees of financially troubled South Carolina State University unanimously voted Monday to place President Thomas Elzey on administrative leave.

headline.main: South Carolina: A State University Puts Its President on Administrative Leave
headline.print_headline: South Carolina: A State University Puts Its President on Administrative Leave

snippet: Trustees of financially troubled South Carolina State University unanimously voted Monday to place President Thomas Elzey on administrative leave.
